bike.description: WSD OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & seatstay w/alloy chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, front derailleur internal cable routing, aluminum EVO Link, oversized pivot bearings, replaceable derailleur hanger, 120mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Rhythm Elite TLR Disc wheel system, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub, 28 hole, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Shimano Deore XT M785 hydraulic disc brakes
Trek shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
